tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE MatchSchedule (
  match_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  match_date DATE,
  location VARCHAR(50),
  home_team VARCHAR(50),
  away_team VARCHAR(50),
  result VARCHAR(10)
);

CREATE TABLE MatchResults (
    result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    match_id INT,
    winner VARCHAR(50),
    loser VARCHAR(50),
    winning_score INT,
    losing_score INT
);

CREATE TABLE MatchResults (
    result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    match_id INT,
    winner_team VARCHAR(255),
    loser_team VARCHAR(255),
    winning_score INT,
    losing_score INT
);

CREATE TABLE MatchStatistics (
    statistic_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    match_id INT,
    team_name VARCHAR(255),
    goals_scored INT,
    possession DECIMAL(5,2),
    fouls_committed INT
);

CREATE TABLE match_schedule (
    match_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    match_date DATE,
    team1 VARCHAR(50),
    team2 VARCHAR(50),
    venue VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE result (
    result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    match_id INT,
    winner VARCHAR(50),
    loser VARCHAR(50),
    score VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE statistics (
    stats_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    match_id INT,
    team VARCHAR(50),
    player_name VARCHAR(50),
    goals_scored INT,
    assists INT
);

CREATE TABLE matches (
    match_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    match_date DATE,
    match_time TIME,
    stadium_name VARCHAR(50),
    home_team VARCHAR(50),
    away_team VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE results (
    result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    match_id INT,
    winner VARCHAR(50),
    total_goals INT,
    outcome VARCHAR(10)
);

CREATE TABLE team_stats (
    team_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    team_name VARCHAR(50),
    total_matches INT,
    wins INT,
    losses INT,
    draws INT
);

CREATE TABLE player_stats (
    player_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_name VARCHAR(50),
    team_id INT,
    goals INT,
    assists INT
);

CREATE TABLE referee_records (
    referee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    referee_name VARCHAR(50),
    total_matches INT,
    total_penalties INT,
    avg_match_duration TIME
);
